title.label: Good game but I‚Äôve got some ideas

content.label:
1:land battles so you can go on land and fight solders on land
2:village raids so you can go raid villages on land
3:small fishing boats that you can raid they have less treasure but no defenses
4:customizable character so you can change your looks 
5:three special character attributes ,1 speed,2 strength, 3 health 
6:exploreable land so you can explore on the islands as your character and if you can sometimes find treasure on land.

Thank you for your time I hope you liked my ideas and that they will soon be added to the game.

title.label: Yea, a good wood ship game!

content.label:
So many years ago, on first ever Xbox when Morrowwind was new, I used to love playing Pirates of the Caribbean, not the later game but this old thing I found used in a bin somewhere I think might have been released premovie even...
It‚Äôs land mission controls were so awful glitchy, but I suffered through that and other problems for the fantastic sea battles and have wondered for 12-15 years?...where is an update to that game!?!

There have been so many bad pirate ship games, Sid Meiers and all the rest, finally we got a cool one here...

Not many complaints, free to start but if you really wanna play the ads will bug you if you don‚Äôt pay up, but it feels like a game worth paying for so far...

It would be nice if you could toggle off the magic crystals and keep it more real but it‚Äôs still fun and challenging steering for the advantage;
I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll find more ways I wish it were more real and that‚Äôs my request to the wind for developers

The graphics are wonderful and the mechanics are easy to use.  There‚Äôs just enough content to make it interesting.  

But I can see this game becoming so much more!

- they have lit pools to indicate where you can transition to land and go on foot.  They need to create these lit areas around the entire island to allow disembarking at will.  To make islands much larger for treasure hunting and more in depth quests.

- add random encounters at sea whether you‚Äôre ready or not, make it challenging - add the fear aspect.

- add the ability to disembark at towns and cities where you can recruit your crew based on personality and stats.

- I could keep on with the suggestions, so kudos to the team who developed this game.  Keep up the good work!
Make it so you can make fleets and attack towns with fleets.
This game is awesome, but I don‚Äôt like how I have to pay for a new ship. If this could be changed I think the game will be even more fun.
This game is absulutely awesome it has realy improved my life and developers just keep doing what your doing

title.label: Two versions of the same game? Why?!

content.label:
First I got to say I really love the older version of this game, (with its last update a few months ago) which can be found with the identical name. I‚Äôve purchased a few DLCs there and enjoyed the pirate life long enough and had my ship equipped with every best things I‚Äôve collected (including those from undead ships!)
Then, found this newer version getting more recent updates.
Being curious as to whether anything is different or new, what I actually found is it to be identical but making me start all over again with no option to resume my previous progress!
Just hope that you won‚Äôt leave out the all time players of ‚Äúthe older version‚Äù from updates.

title.label: Good game with too many bugs

content.label:
Quests won‚Äôt complete and result in you being chased by trash mobs all game. Issues with in app purchases not showing. I‚Äôm waiting on my 100k gold iap to get fixed but I‚Äôve already made 7 million just playing. It‚Äôs only 2 bucks lost but customer support was not helpful. Frustrated because I really enjoy the gameplay. If you don‚Äôt mind paying full price to play the beta ...

title.label: AWESOME GAME though the full version is not free

content.label: This game is awesome packed with adventure I love it it‚Äôs not like those other pirate games with bad graphics.I love how Herocraft add such details but I wish it was free.
They put a way point in the tutorial right inside some rocks. So your ship gets stuck full sail with no way to exit out or start over.

So three days into the game and I‚Äôm getting used to the controls and overall really beginning to enjoy the game. I‚Äôm out at sea when I receive the day three or four rewards and this over fills my boat. Now I can barely move. I have tried to be patient and just float to port but it‚Äôs been hours and barely noticeable progress. Since I haven‚Äôt paid, I cannot capture another ship. My only hope is to dump nearly half my loot. So I figured since I have to lose everything anyway I‚Äôll just start over. This just reset all of my XP but it restarts with me away from port and with most of my earned loot. Now I am still overweight and cannot move. All of my progress is lost. My only hope is to throw away all 3 or 4 day‚Äôs worth of rewards. So frustrating. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll be playing again.

Not bad at all! Easy to get a hang of and balanced gameplay. Even on the free version it‚Äôs enough to keep you entertained for a good while.
 So far my only issue has been weird spawning when you enter a battle, sometimes they drop me directly on a bomb or right next to an island that damages the hull. But a pretty minor thing in the long run. Also there should be away to cancel missions you accepted. l wish to buy the full version when I can, it seems worth it
Since the difficulty bug gotten fixed haven‚Äôt encountered any other bugs so great job devs! (don‚Äôt know how my other review gotten deleted)
This game needs a tutorial to help

I personally love this game especially for a mobile game! Just one thing i‚Äôd change, i do not spend money on add-ons and this game to get any fun progress you must buy add ons, specifically ships, i wish that you could have new ships without buying an add on. This would be so great, if you made a really crazy mission to earn a nerfed bark or something that is available for everyone even without add ons, this would be very fun! Or have an expensive bark or something at only one island! Again this game is great everything is perfect exept for the fact that if you dont get add ons you are stuck on a, well boring xebec. Its not nesasarily boring, ive just been playing for days worth of time and i want to spice up the game! Keep up the good work!!!! You guys are very good at what you do!!! - VERY SATUSFIED

Update on my review!!! : the devs are AMAZING they are on top of thier game and dont leave any user in the dust!!! This app and the devs are perfect! Thank you devs and keep up the AMAZING work!!!!!

I love this game, I‚Äôve been addicted to it ever since I downloaded it. Just a one thing (the only reason it got 4 stars), I really think that there should be more fun things to do, like more legendary ships like the Grim Reaper, that was so fun and having the chance to capture it and keep it. I think more things like this would be great. Stuff like legendary ship missions or even ships available for purchase, like the Flying Dutchman or the Queen Anne‚Äôs Revenge or something of that nature. I would definitely pay for that. To add on to that would just be more ship suggestions for other ships, all the ships are pretty plain and there aren‚Äôt a lot of options that make your ship unique. Anyways, that‚Äôs really all I have! Such a great game though, definitely worth downloading, looking forward to what‚Äôs next!!

title.label: Not worth unless you have money

content.label:

Edit:ok seems cool though!

I love playing the little bit of game you can play!! It is great! But they try to make you pay for everything!! For example, you can board ships, but in order to capture ships, you have to buy the full version. If you want to unlock all refurbishment slots, you have to buy the full version. If you want to play all of the quest, you have to buy the full version. If you want to go to other maps, you have to buy the full version(I tried sailing off the edge of the map, and they send sea monsters that kill you!! No way to get away from them) if you want to buy new ships with coins, you have to buy the full version. So until they stop trying to make you buy EVERYTHING, I‚Äôm done playing this game!!
